channel.title: Pray Drain Faster In Certain areas [Help]
channel.description: So yea the tittle says it all how can i make so in certain areas the prayer drains faster, for example in fight caves or barrows? if anyone help ill appreciate a lot++ thanks!

item.title: Pray Drain Faster In Certain areas [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

I’ll let you figure out most of it…

But, you have to make a

IfIsInArea

And the coords and then for each prayer, IfIsInAreaBarrows, make it drain, assuming you already have a working drainer.
Just make it like this:

Regular Drain: -3
IfIsInAreaBarrows: -5+misc.random(3)

(You can get rid of the misc random if you wish.)

Read full topic
item.source: Pray Drain Faster In Certain areas [Help]
